overview: "Shinjitsu no Uta" (真実の詩) is the fourteenth single by Do As Infinity, released in 2002. It was used as the fifth ending to the anime InuYasha.  This song was included in the band's compilation album Do the A-side.  Track Listing:  1.  "Shinjitsu no Uta" (真実の詩, Song of Truth)  2. "One or Eight"  3. "Shinjitsu no Uta" (真実の詩, Song of Truth) (Instrumental)  4. "One or Eight" (Instrumental)
title: Shinjitsu no Uta
